teachers.description: As a teacher, I strive to create a dynamic and accessible learning environment for all my students. During my time at the University Sidi Mohamed Ben Abdellah in Morocco, I developed a passion for fostering curiosity and critical thinking in my students. I designed engaging lesson plans that catered to diverse learning styles, ensuring that each student had the opportunity to thrive. My commitment to inclusivity led me to incorporate a variety of teaching methods, including hands-on activities, group discussions, and digital resources, to create an interactive and supportive classroom atmosphere.

I am a passionate Kiwi (from New Zealand) guide and language tutor, with a keen interest in language, culture, and nature. With fluency in English, French, and Spanish, and proficiency in several other languages, I take pleasure in interacting with people from diverse backgrounds and helping them achieve their language learning objectives. Whether you are a beginner or an advanced learner, I can support you in your language learning journey with tailored teaching and guidance. It brings me immense joy to impart my knowledge and skills in language teaching to students of all levels, regardless of their motivation.

Welcome! I'm Victoria. I live in the Canadian prairies with my husband and two children.  Some of my hobbies include hiking, reading, embroidery, and traveling. I have a Bachelor of Arts in English Literature, a Bachelor of Education, and a TESOL / TEFL Certificate. I look forward to meeting you and getting to know you better.

Hi everyone. My name is Alessio, I am a 38 year old teacher from Italy. In the last 15 years I have travelled to over 15 countries teaching Italian and English as second language. I am a mountain lover, I spend my free time in nature. I love doing sports such as rock climbing and slackline and also practicing Yoga everyday.

I love teaching Business English, Conversational English, and Interview preparation thus enabling the disheartened students for certification of Duolingo, IELTS, and CELPIP is my cup of tea. Because; all of my current and past participants' progression and successes have given me enough confidence to guarantee your investment for achieving career path will never be wasted.
